act_info.full_title: Occupational Safety and Health Day Act, 2021, S.O. 2021, c. 6
act_info.act_name_text: Occupational Safety and Health Day Act, 2021

content.content: 1 The first Tuesday in May in each year is proclaimed as Occupational Safety and Health Day. 2 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1 The first Tuesday in May in each year is proclaimed as Occupational Safety and Health Day.

2 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
